page.title: 15Woods Croft Museum.
page.content: The name is taken from the land on which it stands which was once owned by George Wood. {Agricultural Section}_ In here lots of hand tools used for working the land can be seen. In the{medical section}are old medical tools which were used to treat the animals. The{Wheel Wrights and Blacksmith's {section}has many hand tools of their trade. One small area is taken up by a {Mere Maker.}This was a trade of great importance before the 1930s for the catchment of water in a porous limestone. The{domestic section}also has many items of interest.
